transcript:
Hello. Hello. Hello. Haan ji. 
Hai Sanjiv sir very good morning. Sir main Hemant baat kar raha hun sir senior manager India market head office se.
Hello.
Sir main abhi nahi hun main drive kar raha hun sir.
Okay Sanjiv sir bas aap koi suitable time de do sir kyuki aapka feedback aaya tha non satisfy kal aapne jo discussion hua tha uske pe aapne theek hai sir.
Thik hai Sanjiv sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Feedback was non satisfactory from a previous discussion.



Resolution:

- Request to provide a suitable time to discuss the feedback.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Request to provide a suitable time to discuss the feedback.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

feedback, discussion, time
